translated: The bass (Scientific name: Dicentrarchus labrax), commonly called just bar, or wolf, or loubine sea bass is a fish that belongs to the family of Moronidae.
original: Le bar commun (nom scientifique : Dicentrarchus labrax), couramment appelé juste bar, ou encore loup, perche de mer ou loubine, est un poisson qui appartient à la famille des moronidés.
